name: BEREAVED_OT
description: This table contains information about your bereaved records. These include contact dates and times, name history, and instant of edit and entry. The records included in this table are Bereavement Contact (LHB) records.

columns.name: RECORD_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the bereavement contact record.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE_REAL
columns.description: A unique contact date in decimal format. The integer portion of the number indicates the date of contact. The digits after the decimal distinguish different contacts on the same date and are unique for each contact on that date. For example, .00 is the first/only contact, .01 is the second contact, etc.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE
columns.description: The date of this contact in calendar format.

columns.name: CONTACT_SERIAL_NUM
columns.description: The unique contact serial number (CSN) of the bereavement contact contact. If you use IntraConnect, this is the Unique Contact Identifier (UCI).

columns.name: CONTACT_NUM
columns.description: The serial number of a contact on the bereavement contact record.

columns.name: CM_CT_OWNER_ID
columns.description: The Community ID (CID) of the instance that owns this contact. This is only populated if you use IntraConnect.

columns.name: INSTANT_OF_ENT_DTTM
columns.description: The instant of entry when a record is edited

columns.name: UPDATE_USER_ID
columns.description: The user who updated this bereaved record.

columns.name: UPDATE_USER_ID_NAME
columns.description: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.

columns.name: UPDATE_INSTANT_DTTM
columns.description: The instant of the update to the bereaved record.
